alert.note: Alert for La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 5:18PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Otero, southwestern Kiowa and northwestern Bent Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 517 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Blue Lake, or 19 miles northeast of North La Junta. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Blue Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County
